casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samuel R. FLIPPEN. No. 178A95-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Richard M. Greene, Greensboro, for Flippen. Valerie Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

AMENDED ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2006 by Defendant for Stay of Execution:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
